animation.text: eval let date_disp=time=>(time<10?'0':'')+time;let set_date=new Date();let hours_disp=date_disp(set_date.getHours());let minutes_disp=date_disp(set_date.getMinutes());let seconds_disp=date_disp(set_date.getSeconds());let dt_separator=':';`Time: ${hours_disp}${dt_separator}${minutes_disp}${dt_separator}${seconds_disp}`
